Texts.Eng: A book that gives you basic directions.
Explore the universe. You may discover something new.
^green;After the Ruinbuster^white;: Go to the outpost and talk to the Mysterious Trader(a person in a red robe). He will give you a series of quests to collect the elemental artifacts.

^green;Starting the new story-line^white;: Defeat any Vault Guardian. You should be given an item that is essential to crafting the Ancient Forge. It will have a crafting recipe for the Bossvault Door. Proceed through the world that you enter through that door.
